word: From the days of eternity the Lord Jesus Christ was one with the Father; He was \93the image of God,\94 the image of His greatness and majesty, \93the outshining of his glory.\94 It was to manifest this glory that He came to our world. To this sin-darkened earth He came to reveal the light of God\92s love\97to be \93God with us.\94. . .
